I'm not going to say much since this place has a pretty solid team and reputation, so whoever goes there is aware that food is going to be good.The goodAll the food was great.The olives were amazing.Desert and coffee also wonderful.The badThe restroom had a broken sink (sorry, I'm weird about restaurant's bathrooms)The ramen dish was way overpriced for the serving. I mean, I don't mind expensive places but this dish was totally out of place price wise (although pretty tasteful).The awesomeThe service is greatThe decoration of the place is also wonderfulThe textures and presentation of the dishesTickets is a must Be aware that reservations go fast and have to be made in advance (they take reservations 60 days in advance)Cheers
